short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically grab vehicle information and make a Facebook Marketplace listing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Listing Scraper, the ultimate Facebook Marketplace listing tool. This Chrome Extension adds a "Scrape Vehicle" button attached to each AutoTrader listing. Press this button to select vehicle listings and they will be added to your personal dashboard. Queue vehicles from your personal dashboard to extract the images and information. Press "Post to Facebook Marketplace" to automatically create and post multiple Facebook Marketplace listings simultaneously. Basic subscription allows users to upload 50 vehicles per day, and 300 per month. Pro subscription allows unlimited usage, multiple users, and with additional automation features. Compatible with AutoTrader.ca and AutoTrader.com. Free trial available. Subscription required. Please visit https://listingscraper.com/ for more details.

No personal or dealership information required, no API key required, and no dealer permissions required. This tool does not require access to any sensitive information, and strictly extracts all images and data from the AutoTrader website.
